cancel.description: Button to close modal without save

edit.description: Modal title for editing a rule

export.description: Button to export all rules as a json file

headerName.description: Label for header name in modal

headerValue.description: Label for header value in modal

header_empty.description: Message for saving a rule without header name

import.description: Button to import rules from a file

matchRule.description: Label for match rule in modal

matchType.description: Label for match type in modal

match_rule_empty.description: Message for saving a rule without match rule

name_empty.description: Message for saving a rule without name

redirectTo.description: Label for redirect to in modal

redirect_empty.description: Message for saving a rule without redirect target if rule type is redirect

ruleType.description: Label for rule type in modal
